metadata.title: Starry Sky - Fast Track Service at Tan Son Nhat Airport
metadata.description: Experience seamless travel with Starry Sky’s Fast Track service at Tan Son Nhat Airport. Save time and enjoy a hassle-free journey!

home.title: Starry Sky
home.description: © 2025 Starry Sky, Inc. Developed by Hoang An

not-found.title: OPPS..., PAGE NOT FOUND!
not-found.content: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.

services.title: Fast Track Service
services.description: Our Fast Track Service ensures a seamless airport experience by meeting guests at the arrival gate or a designated pick-up point at the international terminal, assisting with visa processing if applicable, guiding them through immigration and customs procedures, helping retrieve their luggage, and supporting with security screening procedures. Finally, we escort guests and their luggage to their vehicle or to the boarding lounge for a smooth transition.
services.quote: "Let us be your trustworthy airport buddy"
services.quote-lts: , and you will never regret it.

services.title: VIP B Arrival Service
services.description:
• Staff greets passengers at the jet bridge
  • Escorts passengers directly to CACK without passing through the baggage claim area
  • Assists passengers to exit the terminal and reach their vehicle
    (Staff will collect the passenger's passport for immigration procedures upon meeting and return it once they are in the vehicle)

services.title: Business Class Arrival Service
services.description:
• Greets passengers at the arrival gate or designated meeting point at the international terminal
  • Assists with visa procedures (if applicable)
  • Assists with immigration procedures
  • Assists with customs procedures
  • Assists with baggage claim
  • Escorts passengers and their luggage to the vehicle

services.title: Standard VIP Arrival Service
services.description:
• Greets passengers at the immigration area
  • Assists with visa procedures if needed
  • Guides passengers to the baggage claim area, where passengers retrieve their luggage, then escorts them out

services.title: Business Class Departure Service
services.description:
• Greets passengers at the international departure terminal
  • Assists with check-in procedures
  • Assists with immigration procedures
  • Assists with customs procedures
  • Assists with security screening
  • Escorts passengers to the departure lounge

services.title: Standard VIP Departure Service
services.description:
• Assists passengers with immigration procedures (passengers handle check-in independently)
  • Staff escorts passengers through priority immigration lanes
  • Staff escorts passengers through priority security screening

services.title: VIP B Arrival Service
services.description:
• Staff greets passengers at the jet bridge
  • Escorts passengers directly to CACK without passing through the baggage claim area
  • Assists passengers to exit the terminal and reach their vehicle
    (Staff will collect the passenger's passport for procedures upon meeting and return it once they are in the vehicle)

services.title: Business Class Arrival Service
services.description:
• Greets passengers at the arrival gate or designated meeting point at the domestic terminal
  • Assists with baggage claim
  • Escorts passengers and their luggage to the vehicle

services.title: Business Class Departure Service
services.description:
• Greets passengers at the domestic departure terminal
  • Assists with check-in procedures
  • Assists with security procedures
  • Escorts passengers to the boarding gate
